overview: Shlome, a Ysehiva boy Genius, has developed a method to Crack the Lottery numbers. With only 6,800 tickets needed for a sure BIG WIN of $34,000,000.00.  Will it work? How will it affected his life? Family? An Unfolding Drama & nailbiter that will keep you glued to your seat!  Yehuda Groves Presents: The Big Win
title: The Big Win
